tabControls.name: title
tabControls.tooltip: Title of the game.

tabControls.name: subtitle
tabControls.tooltip: Sub-title of the game (if you want it).

tabControls.name: author
tabControls.tooltip: Your name.

tabControls.name: version
tabControls.tooltip: Conventionally, 1.0 will be your first release, so start from 0.1 (and do not worry about getting to 1.10, it is not a proper decimal number); some people like to further subdivide, so you might start at 0.1.0.

tabControls.name: thank
tabControls.tooltip: List all your contributors, like beta-testers.

tabControls.name: lang
tabControls.tooltip: So far, only English is supported, but potentially other languages can be added.

tabControls.name: jsAdvanced
tabControls.tooltip: Tick this to see more advanced options across various tabs.

tabControls.name: jsFilename
tabControls.tooltip: Sorry, this cannot be changed; do 'Save as...'

tabControls.name: files
tabControls.tooltip: A list of files to be included in your game. This must include 'code' and 'data', but you may want to include your own files. Library files are handled separately.

tabControls.name: jsShowRoomsOnly
tabControls.tooltip: By default, you can only select a location as the destination of an exit; untick to also allow items.

tabControls.name: jsNewRoomWhere
tabControls.tooltip: By default, new locations are created at the top level of the hierarchy.

tabControls.name: jsNewItemWhere
tabControls.tooltip: By default, new items are created in the selected location.

tabControls.name: jsAutosaveInterval
tabControls.tooltip: Your game will be saved every so often. Set the number of minutes between saves here.

tabControls.name: debug
tabControls.tooltip: In debugging mode some extra commands are available in game. Untick this before exporting to JavaScript for release.

tabControls.name: test
tabControls.tooltip: Include the testing library and your unit tests in the output files?

tabControls.name: splitLinesOn
tabControls.tooltip: In a text area, what string denotes a line break? The default is what Quest 5 used.

tabControls.name: failCountsAsTurn
tabControls.tooltip: If the player's input is not understood (or is a meta-command, such as HELP or SAVE), should that count as a real turn?

tabControls.name: lookCountsAsTurn
tabControls.tooltip: Should LOOK count as a real turn? Note, this does not affect LOOK AT, which is always counted as a turn.

tabControls.name: convertNumbersInParser
tabControls.tooltip: Tick if you want the parser to understand the words 'one', 'two', etc. as well as the digits. Useful if you have COUNTABLE items, but a slight slow-down in the response.

tabControls.name: maxUndo
tabControls.tooltip: The number of game state saves to keep in memory, and hence the maximum times the player can UNDO in one go. Set to zero to disable undo.

tabControls.name: saveDisabled
tabControls.tooltip: Tick to prevent the player saving her game progress.

tabControls.name: jscustomExits
tabControls.tooltip: Tick to have custom exits, such as port/starboard.

tabControls.name: customExits
tabControls.tooltip: The file should be in the game folder (not currently supported in the editor).

tabControls.name: moneyFormat
tabControls.tooltip: How money should be displayed; use an exclamation mark as a stand-in for the actual value.

tabControls.name: jsSay
tabControls.tooltip: If this is ticked, characters might react when the player SAYs something.

tabControls.name: turnsQuestionsLast
tabControls.tooltip: When an NPC asks a question, if the player SAYs something within this many turns it will be taken as a reply.

tabControls.name: givePlayerSayMsg
tabControls.tooltip: By default, Quest will add a paragraph about the player saying before the response is given.

tabControls.name: jsnoAskTell
tabControls.tooltip: Untick to allow players to ASK or TELL a character ABOUT a topic.

tabControls.name: noAskTell
tabControls.default: You cannot use ASK/TELL ABOUT in this game.
tabControls.tooltip: You can customise the message saying ASK/TELL is not available, perhaps hinting at an alternative.

tabControls.name: givePlayerAskMsg
tabControls.tooltip: By default, Quest will add a paragraph about the player asking before the response is given.

tabControls.name: jsnoTalkTo
tabControls.tooltip: Untick to allow players to TALK TO a character to see dynamic lists of topics.

tabControls.name: noTalkTo
tabControls.default: You cannot use TALK TO in this game.
tabControls.tooltip: You can customise the message saying TALK TO is not available, perhaps hinting at an alternative.

tabControls.name: dropdownForConv
tabControls.display: Use a drop-down for dynamic conversion choices
tabControls.tooltip: If you use dynamic conversations, tick this to have the options appear in a dropdown list, rather than a list of hyperlinks. A drop-down is easier to access with the keyboard.

tabControls.name: npcReactionsAlways
tabControls.display: NPC reactions, even if not present
tabControls.tooltip: By default, if an NPC is not in the same room as the player, we do not worry about his or her reactions.

tabControls.name: jsTrackTime
tabControls.tooltip: Do you want to correlate turns with how time is passing?

tabControls.name: dateTime__secondsPerTurn
tabControls.tooltip: How many seconds are assumed to pass in-game each standard turn.

tabControls.name: dateTime__locale
tabControls.tooltip: Determines how the date and time are displayed; a BCP 47 language tag, for example 'en - GB' or 'en - US', or 'default' for whatever the user's browser is set to.

tabControls.name: dateTime__start
tabControls.tooltip: The time in-game that the game starts. You need to get the format right, as per this example: April 1, 2019 09:43:00

tabControls.name: dateTime__year
tabControls.tooltip: How to display the year; 'numeric' or '2-digit'.

tabControls.name: dateTime__month
tabControls.tooltip: How to display the month; 'numeric', '2-digit', 'long', 'short' or 'narrow'.

tabControls.name: dateTime__day
tabControls.tooltip: How to display the year, 'numeric' or '2-digit'.

tabControls.name: dateTime__hour
tabControls.tooltip: How to display the hour, 'numeric' or '2-digit'.

tabControls.name: dateTime__minute
tabControls.tooltip: How to display the minute, 'numeric' or '2-digit'.

tabControls.name: intro
tabControls.tooltip: This text will appear when your game starts. Use it to introduce the game to the player, setting up the premise, hinting at the objective, or whatever.

tabControls.name: setup
tabControls.tooltip: This script will run when your game starts. Use it to setup the game.

tabControls.name: textInput
tabControls.tooltip: Tick to allow the player to type commands (as opposed to using the buttons in the side pane exclusively).

tabControls.name: cursor
tabControls.tooltip: The symbol(s) to display to prompt the player to type.

tabControls.name: cmdEcho
tabControls.tooltip: Tick to have the player's commands added to the text window.

tabControls.name: textEffectDelay
tabControls.tooltip: How long to wait between revealing each character when using a text effect, in milliseconds.

tabControls.name: clearScreenOnRoomEnter
tabControls.tooltip: Should the screen be cleared whenever the player enters a new location?

tabControls.name: jsRoomTitlePos
tabControls.tooltip: Where do we display the location name in relation to other parts of the location description (set to zero to turn it off)?

tabControls.name: jsRoomTitleNewLine
tabControls.tooltip: Should a new line get added after the location name?

tabControls.name: jsRoomTitleYouAreIn
tabControls.tooltip: If this is off, the location name will be shown as a title.

tabControls.name: jsRoomItemsPos
tabControls.tooltip: Where do we display the list of items in relation to other parts of the location description (set to zero to turn it off)?

tabControls.name: jsRoomItemsNewLine
tabControls.tooltip: Should a new line get added after the list of items?

tabControls.name: jsRoomExitsPos
tabControls.tooltip: Where do we display the list of exits in relation to other parts of the location description (set to zero to turn it off)?

tabControls.name: jsRoomExitsNewLine
tabControls.tooltip: Should a new line get added after the exit list?

tabControls.name: jsRoomDescPos
tabControls.tooltip: Where do we display the descriptive text in relation to other parts of the location description (set to zero to turn it off)?

tabControls.name: jsRoomDescNewLine
tabControls.tooltip: Should a new line get added after the descriptive text?

tabControls.name: jsStyleMain_font_family
tabControls.tooltip: Font for the main text.

tabControls.name: jsStyleMain_font_size
tabControls.tooltip: Font size for the main text.

tabControls.name: jsStyleMain_color
tabControls.tooltip: The colour of the text for the main text.

tabControls.name: jsStyleMain_background_color
tabControls.tooltip: The background colour for the main text.

tabControls.name: jsGoogleFonts
tabControls.tooltip: List all the Google fonts you want to be able to use in your game to ensure they are downloaded (including in the side pane).

tabControls.name: panes
tabControls.tooltip: You can have the side pane on the left or right, or not at all.

tabControls.name: compass
tabControls.tooltip: Show the compass rose?

tabControls.name: jsInvHere
tabControls.tooltip: Show an inventory of items at this location?

tabControls.name: jsInvHeld
tabControls.tooltip: Show an inventory of items the player is holding?

tabControls.name: jsInvWorn
tabControls.tooltip: Show an inventory of items the player is wearing?

tabControls.name: jsInvHere
tabControls.tooltip: Show an inventory of items at this location?

tabControls.name: jsStatusPaneFlag
tabControls.tooltip: Do you want the status component?

tabControls.name: statusPane
tabControls.tooltip: A title for the status component.

tabControls.name: statusWidthLeft
tabControls.tooltip: Width in pixels for the left column in the status component.

tabControls.name: statusWidthRight
tabControls.tooltip: Width in pixels for the right column in the status component.

tabControls.name: jsdivider
tabControls.tooltip: Insert an image in the side pane between each component?

tabControls.name: divider
tabControls.tooltip: File name for an image to be inserted between each component.

tabControls.name: jsStatusList
tabControls.tooltip: List all your status attributes for the player.

tabControls.name: jsStyleSide_font_family
tabControls.tooltip: Font for the side text.

tabControls.name: jsStyleSide_font_size
tabControls.tooltip: Font size for the side text.

tabControls.name: jsStyleSide_color
tabControls.tooltip: The colour of the text for the side text.

tabControls.name: jsStyleSide_background_color
tabControls.tooltip: The background colour for the side text.
